name: XReader C++ DevBox
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y debhelper gobject-introspection intltool libarchive-dev libdjvulibre-dev libgail-3-dev libgirepository1.0-dev libglib2.0-dev libgtk-3-dev libgtk2.0-dev libgxps-dev libjs-mathjax libkpathsea-dev libpoppler-glib-dev libsecret-1-dev libsm-dev libspectre-dev libtiff-dev libwebkit2gtk-4.1-dev libxapp-dev libx11-dev mate-common xsltproc yelp-tools
sudo apt update && sudo apt install devscripts equivs && sudo mk-build-deps -ir
